class Solution:
    def maxOperations(self, s: str) -> int:
        is_last = True

        n = len(s)
        i, j = 0, n - 1

        # while j >= 0:
        #     if s[j] == '1':
        #         j -= 1
        #         is_last = False
        #     else:
        #         break

        ans = 0
        k = 0
        
        while i < n:
            
            if s[i] == '1':

                j = i
                while j < n and s[j] == '1':
                    j += 1
                
                # print(f"i = {i}, j = {j}")
                if j == n:
                    break

                k += j - i
                # print(f"k = {k}")
                
                ans += k

                i = j - 1
            # i = j - 1
            i += 1
            
             

        return ans
